title: Koch-Rajbongshi National Convention hails ‘peace agreement’ with ULFA - Sentinelassam
text: Koch-Rajbongshi National Convention hails ‘peace agreement’ with ULFA The Koch-Rajbongshi National Convention (KRNC) welcomed the peace agreement on the way to be signed tomorrow between the government and the pro-talk ULFA faction. STAFF REPORTER GUWAHATI: The Koch-Rajbongshi National Convention (KRNC) welcomed the peace agreement on the way to be signed tomorrow between the government and the pro-talk ULFA faction. The organisation hopes that this peace agreement will ensure constitutional safeguards for the indigenous people of the state in their socio-economic, political, and educational aspects. In a statement, KRNC general secretary Biswajit Rai said, “A large number of indigenous people, including Koch-Rajbonghsis, had to lose their lives in the prolonged armed conflicts of the ULFA. The pro-talk faction of the [ULFA ](https://www.sentinelassam.com/topheadlines/assam-army-goc-in-c-lt-gen-rp-kalita-urges-paresh-barua-to-return-683365)talked to various ethnic communities in the state to prepare its charter of demands for the peace talks. They also had talks with the Koch-Rajbongshis. We hope that the peace agreement will be reflective of the hopes and aspirations of the indigenous people of the state.” Also read: [Assam: Army GOC-in-C Lt Gen R.P.
